Key Match Events: Riley Greene made a clutch, tumbling catch in the stands during the fifth inning.
Riley Greene hit a solo home run in the first inning, setting off a six-run, six-hit opening inning.
Riley Greene's fourth-inning sacrifice fly scored Jake Rogers, providing an important insurance run.
Post-Match Reflections: Manager A.J. Hinch praised Riley Greene's performance and his role in the team.
Riley Greene expressed appreciation for the fans' support and intensity during the games.
